DefaultEvent.Description: It is delighted with the souls. It cradles them to its chest: it whispers. It tosses you a bag of coins. "I am indebted! If we zee each other again - if - if only - then bring me more zouls? Just a few more zouls."
DefaultEvent.Name: "Zouls!"

ChildBranches.Name: Yes, you have zouls. Souls.
ChildBranches.Description: Offer it a crate of human souls.

DefaultEvent.Description: It leaps away with commendable agility: Its knees, you think, bend the wrong way. Its arm beneath the sleeve, where you laid a hand on it, felt more like wood or lacquer than flesh. It scuttles away into the darkness.
DefaultEvent.Name: An uncertain shape

ChildBranches.Name: No zouls for you!
ChildBranches.Description: Curse and push the Buzzing Beggar aside.

DefaultEvent.Description: "Perhaps - another time - you'll bring me zouls? I might be here. Or perhaps, I will not."
DefaultEvent.Name: "I zee. I zee. I understand."

Description: "Zzouls, my friend," a masked figure entreats you. "Zzouls. Do you have zzouls? I miss them zo. Let me pay you for them."
Name: A Buzzing Beggar
